title: Breakfast with Neko
description: Hi Neko! I'm creating this event to invite you to have breakfast before work. Meet me at Coffebucks.

title: Streaming Party
description: The biggest party for Twitch streamers! Come and join us at Shenron Arena.

title: CosWorld 2019 After Party
description: Join us at the CosWorld after party! We'll be eating, drinking and having a great time exchanging experiences...

title: Artistic Painting Course
description: Come to have a great time with us at our artistic painting course! Begginers and experts welcome!
